bill.summary:
Preventing Terrorism from Hitting America's Streets Act
This bill requires the National Counterterrorism Center to report to Congress an assessment of any increased risk of terrorism in the United States due to the withdrawal of U.S. Armed Forces from Afghanistan, including the potential for Afghanistan to be used as a base of operations for international terrorism. The report shall also describe illicit activities carried out along the U.S. southern border by non-state actors or adversarial countries.
